name: Aming Wu
content: Aming Wu Aming Wu Email I am currently a professor of HFUT. Previously, I was an associate professor at Xidian University. My research interests include video captioning, visual question answering, object detection, few-shot learning, unsupervised learning, and transfer learning. Our goal is to build an Efficient, Safe, and Stable single/multi-modal perception and understanding system for open scenarios. I received my Ph.D. degree at Tianjin University, supervised by Prof. Yahong Han. From 2019 to 2020, I was a visiting student at the University of Technology Sydney, supervised by Prof. Yi Yang. Before Ph.D., I have studied Autonomous Driving for more than 3 years. News Aug 2025. I was invited as Area Chair of ICLR 2026. Jul 2025. One paper was accepted by TPAMI. Jun 2025. Three papers were accepted by ICCV. Apr 2025. One paper was accepted by TIP. Feb 2025. Three papers were accepted by CVPR. One paper is selected as Highlight. Jan 2025. One paper was accepted by ICLR. Jun 2024. One paper was accepted by TMM. Feb 2024. One paper was accepted by CVPR 2024. Jan 2024. One paper was accepted by ICLR 2024. Jan 2024. One paper was accepted by TIP. Oct 2023. One paper was accepted by TPAMI. Jul 2023. Two papers were accepted by ICCV 2023. Feb 2023. One paper was accepted by CVPR 2023. Mar 2022. Two papers were accepted by CVPR 2022. Nov 2021. CSIG Outstanding Dissertation. One paper was accepted by NeurIPS 2021. Two papers were accepted by ICCV 2021. One paper was accepted by IJCAI 2021. Feb 2021. One paper was accepted by TPAMI. Selected Publications §: equal contribution to the first author. *: corresponding author.
